name: Rakuten, Inc
membership: Computer and Communications Industry Association (CCIA), Japan Association of New Economy (JANE)
goal: Our corporate mission since founding has been based on the empowerment of individuals and society through innovation and entrepreneurship. We contribute to innovation and the enrichment of society by helping as many people as possible to excel, while providing services that deliver high levels of satisfaction for both users and partner enterprises. Through these activities, we aim to maximize the corporate value and shareholder value of the Group and continue to be a Global Innovation Company.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Initiatives, policies and legislative files implementing the Digital Single Market strategy
